content:
I've setup a Freelancer server for anyone to use. Here's how to use it: For the moment we are running Freelancer without any mods, so feel free to skip steps 2 and 3.
  1. Install freelancer
  2. Install mod manager (1.31)
  3. Install Discovery Mod (4.85) (http://www.moddb.com/mods/discovery-freelancer/downloads)
  4. Run "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Games\Freelancer\EXE\fldirect.exe" and when asked enter the IP 93.97.160.59 and leave the port as 2302.
  5. At the bottom it asks if you want to boot freelancer... you do!
  6. If it asks, update freelancer to update 3.
  7. Once freelancer is booted, go into multiplayer and then LAN.
  8. Select our server "Liberty".
  9. Play!
If you get tired of the low resolution here is an article on how to increase freelancer's resolution.
title: How to join my freelancer server
name: how-to-join-my-freelancer-server
